targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT mv_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT mv_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT monthly_income_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT monthly_income_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT ltv_pct_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT ltv_pct_end AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.change_type AS type, h.symbol, h.weight_end_pct AS weight_pct, h.market_value_delta AS pnl_dollar FROM period_holding_changes h JOIN latest l ON h.period_start_date = l.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date = l.period_end_date WHERE h.period_type = 'WEEK' AND h.change_type IN ('added', 'removed', 'gainer', 'loser') ORDER BY CASE h.change_type WHEN 'added' THEN 1 WHEN 'removed' THEN 2 WHEN 'gainer' THEN 3 WHEN 'loser' THEN 4 END, abs(COALESCE(h.market_value_delta,0)) DESC LIMIT 12;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.change_type AS type, h.symbol, h.weight_end_pct AS weight_pct, h.market_value_delta AS pnl_dollar FROM period_holding_changes h JOIN latest l ON h.period_start_date = l.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date = l.period_end_date WHERE h.period_type = 'WEEK' AND h.change_type IN ('added', 'removed', 'gainer', 'loser') ORDER BY CASE h.change_type WHEN 'added' THEN 1 WHEN 'removed' THEN 2 WHEN 'gainer' THEN 3 WHEN 'loser' THEN 4 END, abs(COALESCE(h.market_value_delta,0)) DESC LIMIT 12;
